department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: a:  semi-reclining woman, her body resting on a large lotus blossom and her PR foot on another lotus blossom; bird perched on a vase with foliage in LRC; b:  4 lines of text

title: Pair of Leaves from '24 Guanyin Manifestations'
